text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ uan ingangarir gumaziba, amadaghtɨma me sidan temeba okɨsɨ, Lebanonɨn Mɨghsɨabar mangɨ, eghtɨ kɨ dar Dɨpenir kamɨn ingaram. Nɨ fo, Saidonia temeba oka bar fo, ezɨ nan ingangarir gumaziba fozir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ uan ingangarir gumaziba amadaghtɨma, me puram men akurvaghsɨ izam. Eghtɨ nɨ manmaghɨn dagɨaba, uan ingangarir gumazibagh ivesɨ ifueghtɨ, kɨ pura nɨ danɨngam.”
